thread.title: Manuel Neuer hands Bayern Munich injury blow as goalkeeper undergoes foot surgery just two weeks before Champions League clash with Real Madrid
thread.title_full: Manuel Neuer hands Bayern Munich injury blow as goalkeeper undergoes foot surgery just two weeks before Champions League clash with Real Madrid

author: ashilton
title: Manuel Neuer hands Bayern Munich injury blow as goalkeeper undergoes foot surgery just two weeks before Champions League clash with Real Madrid
text:
EFL MAN DOWN Manuel Neuer hands Bayern Munich injury blow as goalkeeper undergoes foot surgery just two weeks before Champions League clash with Real Madrid 
German champions were dealt a further scare on Wednesday when winger Douglas Costa limped out of training By Alec Shilton Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MANUEL NEUER has dealt Bayern Munich an injury scare just a fortnight before their clash with Real Madrid. 
The Bavarian giants have announced they the Germany keeper has undergone a “successful minor operation”. Getty Images Manuel Neuer has undergone an operation, Bayern Munich announced 
Bayern only expect Neuer to miss Bundesliga matches with Augsburg and Hoffenheim over the next week. 
Keep up to date with all the latest news, gossip, rumours and done deals in SunSport’s live transfer blog 
The German champions could have thrown anyone between the sticks as they thrashed Arsenal 10-2 on aggregate in the Champions League last 16. 
But they are likely to have to show plenty of resilience to get past Los Blancos in the quarter-finals. Alexis Sanchez casts doubts over Arsenal future after saying he wants to stay in London and play for winning team Yes way Jose Jose Mourinho is eyeing up a potential move for Atletico Madrid centre-back Jose Gimenez 'He is absurd' Jose Mourinho compares Manchester United's attempts to buy Neymar as like trying to crack open a vault Handy Andy Gladbach confirm Andreas Christensen WILL return to Chelsea after ace impressed Antonio Conte CUT AND DRIES Manchester United to offer £30m Dries Mertens £4.3m salary in bid to poach him from Napoli 
Neuer missed the recent internationals against England and Azerbaijan with a calf problem 
And they will hope that he heels in time or else they will be forced to field reserve stopper Sven Ulreich in goal, whose only appearance this term was in the 3-2 defeat to Rostov at the end of the group stage. 
Bayern also have concerns over the fitness Douglas Costa. Getty Images Douglas Costa was a thorn in Arsenal's side as the Gunners were hammered Getty Images Costa returned to training this week only to limp out yesterday Douglas Costa scores a great backwards penalty in Bayern Munich training 
The tricky Brazilian has been struggling with a knee problem and has seen docs over the issue. 
He returned to training at the start of the week but had to pull out of a session on Wednesday. 
The former Shakhtar Donetsk ace has been in fine form this season and has put suitors on red alert after telling Bayern chiefs than he is keen on a move this summer. Bayern Munich FC players imitate Friends sitcom theme tune in fun vide
